hadiths.text: It was narrated from Hudhaifah bin Asid that the Prophet (ﷺ) led them out and said:“Pray for a brother of yours who has died in a land other than yours.” They said: “Who is he?” He said: “Najashi.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الصَّلاَةِ عَلَى النَّجَاشِيِّ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the prayers for Najashi
